York Sport President

And so, another year of sport at York is looming. The second year of York Sport's existence looks like it should be as compelling as its first. With the clubs showing a much more united front, playing in their matching black and gold strips, it will hopefully be a year of York clubs supporting each other as well as themselves. (Thumbnail credit Emily Scoot, York Sport President)
